name: Crockpot Beef Soup
comments: You probably don't want the soup to cook all 8 hours, as it's rather easy to overcook the meat.
instructions: Combine beef and flour in large Ziploc bag; shake well to coat. Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook beef until browned on all sides, then place in crockpot. Use drippings to cook onion, celery and garlic; add to crockpot. Add remaining ingredients. Cover and cook on Low 6-8 hours or until beef is tender.
